# <a name="how-to-remove-autogenerated-columns-from-a-windows-forms-datagridview-control"></a><span data-ttu-id="d03d1-102">Nasıl yapılır: Otomatik oluşturulan sütunları Windows Forms DataGridView denetiminden kaldırma</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d03d1-102">How to: Remove Autogenerated Columns from a Windows Forms DataGridView Control</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="d03d1-103">Olduğunda, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView> denetimi sütunlarını veri kaynağından verileri temel alan otomatik ayarlama, seçmeli olarak bazı sütunlar atlayabilirsiniz.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d03d1-103">When your <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView> control is set to autogenerate its columns based on data from its data source, you can selectively omit certain columns.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="d03d1-104">Bunu çağırarak yapmak <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumnCollection.Remove%2A> metodunda <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.Columns%2A> koleksiyonu.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d03d1-104">You can do this by calling the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumnCollection.Remove%2A> method on the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.Columns%2A> collection.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="d03d1-105">Alternatif olarak, ayarlayarak görünümünde sütunları gizleyebilirsiniz <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumn.Visible%2A> özelliğini `false`.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d03d1-105">Alternatively, you can hide columns from view by setting the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumn.Visible%2A> property to `false`.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="d03d1-106">Bu teknik, gizli sütunlarda belirli koşullarda görüntülemek istediğinizde veya görüntülemeden sütunları verilere erişmek gerektiğinde yararlı olur.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d03d1-106">This technique is useful when you want to display the hidden columns in certain conditions, or when you need to access the data in the columns without displaying it.</span></span>  
  
### <a name="to-remove-autogenerated-columns"></a><span data-ttu-id="d03d1-107">Otomatik oluşturulan sütunları kaldırmak için</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d03d1-107">To remove autogenerated columns</span></span>  
  
-   <span data-ttu-id="d03d1-108">Çağrı <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumnCollection.Remove%2A> metodunda <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.Columns%2A> koleksiyonu.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d03d1-108">Call the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumnCollection.Remove%2A> method on the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.Columns%2A> collection.</span></span>  
  
     [!code-csharp[System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewMisc#111](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewMisc/CS/datagridviewmisc.cs#111)]
     [!code-vb[System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewMisc#111](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewMisc/VB/datagridviewmisc.vb#111)]  
  
### <a name="to-hide-autogenerated-columns"></a><span data-ttu-id="d03d1-109">Otomatik oluşturulan sütunları gizlemek için</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d03d1-109">To hide autogenerated columns</span></span>  
  
-   <span data-ttu-id="d03d1-110">Sütun kümesi <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumn.Visible%2A> özelliğini `false`.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d03d1-110">Set the column's <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumn.Visible%2A> property to `false`.</span></span>  
  
     [!code-csharp[System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewMisc#112](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewMisc/CS/datagridviewmisc.cs#112)]
     [!code-vb[System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewMisc#112](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewMisc/VB/datagridviewmisc.vb#112)]

## <a name="compiling-the-code"></a><span data-ttu-id="d03d1-112">Kod Derleniyor</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d03d1-112">Compiling the Code</span></span>  
 <span data-ttu-id="d03d1-113">Bu örnek gerektirir:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d03d1-113">This example requires:</span></span>  
  
-   <span data-ttu-id="d03d1-114">A <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView> adlı Denetim `dataGridView1` içeren bir tabloya bağlı `Fax` ve `CustomerID` sütunlar gibi `Customers` Northwind örnek veritabanındaki tablo.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d03d1-114">A <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView> control named `dataGridView1` bound to a table that contains `Fax` and `CustomerID` columns, such as the `Customers` table in the Northwind sample database.</span></span>  
  
-   <span data-ttu-id="d03d1-115">Başvurular <xref:System?displayProperty=nameWithType> ve <xref:System.Windows.Forms?displayProperty=nameWithType> derlemeler.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d03d1-115">References to the <xref:System?displayProperty=nameWithType> and <xref:System.Windows.Forms?displayProperty=nameWithType> assemblies.</span></span>
